title: Life Rewritten
description: She's deleted every trace of Chantal, the celebrity rocker she used to be. Delaney Spencer is making good as a carpenter, a staunch friend and a decent member of the community in Otter Tail, Wisconsin. This is her home now. Except Sam McCabe--sibling to her late bandmate, Diesel--has found her. And he "needs" her to hand over the unreleased songs she and Diesel made together. For the sake of his brother--for the sake of Diesel's children. She's desperate to be a better person and do the right thing. But not if she has to reveal that she's Chantal.She won't do it. Not even for Sam.
author: Margaret Watson
